name: Requirements
text:
[§527‑9]  Requirements.  A transfer on death deed:
     (1)  Except as otherwise provided in paragraph (2), shall contain the essential elements and formalities of a properly recordable inter vivos deed;
     (2)  Shall state that the transfer to the beneficiary is to occur at the transferor's death; and
     (3)  Shall be recorded with the bureau of conveyances or filed in the office of the assistant registrar of the land court, as applicable, before the transferor's death. [L 2011, c 173, pt of §1]
